{{short description|Probably a fortress of Morgoth}}
'''Thimbalt''' was probably a fortress of Morgoth in a early version of the Legendarium, located near Angband on the slopes of Thangorodrim. The name only appears on the north part of the [[The First 'Silmarillion' Map (map)|First 'Silmarillion' Map]] and nowhere else. Thimbalt was struck out using a pencil on the map.<ref>{{SM|North}}, p. 223</ref>

While its meaning is unclear, [[Paul Strack]] suggests on [[Eldamo]] that it is a rejected [[Noldorin]] name.<ref>{{webcite|author=[[Paul Strack]]|articleurl=https://eldamo.org/content/words/word-1079588591.html|articlename=N. ''Thimbalt'' loc.|dated=2022|website=Eldamo|accessed=3 April 2025}}</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://www.elfdict.com/w/thimbalt|articlename=''thimbalt''|dated=|website=[https://www.elfdict.com/ Parf Edhellen: an elvish dictionary]|accessed=3 April 2025}}</ref>
